label: ham
subject: [LH] Re: Love-Hounds Digest, Vol 53, Issue 9
body: 113 (return) [ Let us hear Ammianus himself. H¾c, ut miles quondam et Gr¾cus, a principatu C¾saris Nerv¾ exorsus, adusque Valentis inter, pro virium explicavi mensur‰: opus veritatem professum nun quam, ut arbitror, sciens, silentio ausus corrumpere vel mendacio. Scribant reliqua potiores ¾tate, doctrinisque florentes. Quos id, si libuerit, aggressuros, procudere linguas ad majores moneo stilos. Ammian. xxxi. 16. The first thirteen books, a superficial epitome of two hundred and fifty-seven years, are now lost: the last eighteen, which contain no more than twenty-five years, still preserve the copious and authentic history of his own times.]
